job_title: Fitness Specialist in Chapel Hill, NC
pros: They offer really great benefits, even to part-time employees including PTO and retirement savings contributions. Very supportive work environment.
cons: There can be a lack of growth opportunities in certain departments as tenure is high within the company so people do not often leave higher up positions!

pros: Carol Woods is a great facility. It is clean and has so many activities onsite for the seniors
cons: The facility needs more help so no one is overworked

job_title: IT Specialist in Chapel Hill, NC
pros:
- Great Staff
- Great Residents

- The benefits that are included there are the best I have ever received from any company.

job_title: Registered Nurse in Chapel Hill, NC
pros: Great benefits; Can negotiate for competitive salary
cons: VERY slow to discuss and/or implement change; Little opportunity for staff growth in company

pros: A wonderful company who invests in educational resources for their staff while providing the example of a dynamic culture.
cons: Low salary compared to the market rate.

pros: Good pay, great staff, amazing residents!

job_title: Anonymous Employee in Chapel Hill, NC
pros: Employees are very well taken care of via benefits

review_title: They treat you like real people!
job_title: Resident Assistant in Chapel Hill, NC
pros: This community is like one big family that honors people's human rights as an employee. I am blessed to work here. Their requests are straight forward and clear. They value good information, review, and communication. They also allow sign up sheets for Holidays and give you a 1st,2nd,3rd choice off for Thanksgiving, Christmas, New Years.. I think that this is more than fair.
cons: Relief staff sometimes do not get desired shifts.
The staff isn't team oriented and the nurses don't want to assist staff with resident care even when staff is overwhelmed
Hours are to short. make a living.
